name: Cool Steel
ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.

name: Dark Iron Sword
ability: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20% for 12s.

name: Fillet Blade
ability: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Harbinger of Dawn
ability: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%.

name: Skyrider Sword
ability: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

name: Traveler's Handy Sword
ability: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.

name: Blackcliff Longsword
ability: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Favonius Sword
ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Iron Sting
ability: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

name: Lion's Roar
ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%.

name: Prototype Rancour
ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Royal Longsword
ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Sacrificial Sword
ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: The Black Sword
ability: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%. Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

name: The Flute
ability: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

name: Sword of Descension
ability: Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

name: Festering Desire
ability: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%.

name: Aquila Favonia
ability: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

name: Skyward Blade
ability: CRIT Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

name: Summit Shaper
ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Primordial Jade Cutter
ability: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2% of the wielder's Max HP.

name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
ability: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.

name: Debate Club
ability: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

name: Ferrous Shadow
ability: When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

name: Skyrider Greatsword
ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

name: White Iron Greatsword
ability: Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

name: Blackcliff Slasher
ability: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Favonius Greatsword
ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Lithic Blade
ability: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7% ATK increase and a 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Prototype Archaic
ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Rainslasher
ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.

name: Royal Greatsword
ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

name: Serpent Spine
ability: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

name: The Bell
ability: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by the shield, the character gains 12% increased DMG.

name: Whiteblind
ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

name: Sacrificial Greatsword
ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver

name: Skyward Pride
ability: Increases all DMG by 8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

name: Wolf's Gravestone
ability: Increases ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: The Unforged
ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Black Tassel
ability: Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.

name: Halberd
ability: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160% ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: White Tassel
ability: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24%.

name: Crescent Pike
ability: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK DMG for 5s.

name: Deathmatch
ability: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are less than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

name: Dragon's Bane
ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%.

ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Vortex Vanquisher
ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

ability: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12%.

name: Skyward Spine
ability: Increases CRIT Rate by 8% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

name: Staff of Homa
ability: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional 1% of Max HP.

ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Skyward Harp
ability: Increases CRIT DMG by 20%. Hits have a 60% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

name: Amos' Bow
ability: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG increases by 8% every 0.1s for up to 5 times.

ability: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20% for 12s.

ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.

ability: Picking up an Elemental Energy Orb/Particle recovers 1% HP.

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
ability: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

name: Twin Nephrite
ability: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12% for 15s.

ability: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

ability: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.

ability: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 6s.

name: The Widsith
ability: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240.

name: Eye of Perception
ability: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s.

name: Skyward Atlas
